result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kurtys T King

records.addlTxt: Notice of Hearing Cancellation
SPD Order Appointing Counsel - Att Raff
Hearing on October 20, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Defendant is ordered to contact the Jefferson County Public Defenders office by eob 9/29/22
No updated address information - unable to forward.  (08/17) ML
Interim Statement of service Hours in the amount of 1.3 hours submitted by contract Attorney Frank Raff.
Adjourned initial appearance on December 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

[MK] case called at 12:03pm 
Defendant Kurtys T King not in court.  Attorney Francis Raff in court.  ADA Michael Witt in court for State of Wisconsin. 
The Court provides a summary of the contacts made with the Wyoming authorities and efforts made by court staff regarding having Mr. King appear at this hearing; there was a refusal by the Wyoming authorities to produce Mr. King for appearance.
After discussion with counsel, the Court schedules the case for status conference in December. 
recess 12:11pm

NEXT:  Status Conference [JA-also schedule for AIA]  on December 2nd at 9:30am
JA's Review of 07/15/2022 RUMS
JA's Review of 07/15 RUMS
JA's Review of 07/15 RUMS
Routed to JA/FCC for further review. (07/15) ML
Routed to JA/FCC for further review. (07/15) ML
Scheduling Order
Adjourned initial appearance on July 21, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Francis Raff

[ml] Case called at 8:50AM
[Court Reporter Edward Johnson]
Defendant Kurtys T King appears via telephone from the Fremont County Wyoming Facility. ADA Brookellen Teuber appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Att Teuber verifies Victim Rights Compliance.
The Defendant advises that he wishes to have an attorney in this file.
The Defendant advises that he is in custody in the State of Wyoming at the time of this hearing. ADA Tueber provides information that the expectation is that Mr. King will be released from custody there in November. Furthermore, ADA Teuber states that the Defendant will need to be brought before the Court due to the facility he is being held at not having the capability to conduct remote hearings.
The Court inquires if there is a victim present that wishes to be heard. A victim present makes a statement.

The Court appoints Attorney Francis Raff to this file, at the County's expense.
The Court continues to toll Preliminary Hearing time limits for reasons stated on the record.

recess 8:58AM

NEXT: 
(1) Clerk - Please appoint Attorney Francis Raff to this file
(2) Status Conference (also Status of Counsel) on 07/21 at 11:45AM--JA, note in calendar comments that the Court has tolled prelim time limits
Scheduling Order
Preliminary hearing on July 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Court Order to Jefferson County Dispatch

[ae] case called 11:00 AM Defendant Kurtys T King appeared by telephone in custody from the Fremont Co Jail. ADA Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The Defendant verifies that the address and date of birth listed on the Criminal Complaint are correct. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited
Right to counsel is given.  
Preliminary Hearing scheduled within 20 day time limit.
The Court finds probable cause to exist in the Criminal Complaint.

The Court requires $5000 Signature Bond, with no conditions

The Court quashes warrant
recess 11:08 am
NEXT: (1) Preliminary Hearing [most likely waiver] on 7/7/22 ta 8:30 am [clerk is to notify SPD that defendant would like representation paperwork mailed to him]
"Other" address added for Kurtys King.
Initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Extradition Forecast

[ae] case called 08:58 AM Defendant Kurtys T King not in court. ADA Michaels  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The State requests that a probable cause warrant be issued. Upon review of the file the Court finds probable cause and issues warrant body only.  
Recess 9:00 AM
NOTE: Copy of complaint mailed to Kurtys at the Fremont Co. Jail on 06/14/2022. (NMS)
